name: TATAK
description:
Hand crafted stop motion paper art and music including cool fart sounds and awesome character and so creature design and very unique gameplay and surprise ending very shocking! YES! TATAK is a game where you make some decisions, and see the consequences immediately. Cats, goats, ugly monsters, etc. are featured in hand crafted paper art style.

TATAK is developed by Arda Cevik, Sezer Dalgic, Cagdas Yildirim and Bulut Yildirim during Global Game Jam 2015, @BUG Istanbul

How to Play:

Arrow keys - Move around

Space (on keyboard, if you don't have a controller) - A button

Z (on keyboard, if you don't have a controller) - X button
